product_description: Engineered for ultimate performance, this good-looking workout tee is built to wick moisture, dry quickly and keep you cool while you work out.
product_details_and_care:
Engineered for ultimate performance, this good-looking workout tee is built to wick moisture, dry quickly and keep you cool while you work out.
26" length (size Medium)
Scoop neck
Smooth flatlock seaming designed to eliminate rubbing and irritation
92% polyester, 8% elastane
Machine wash, tumble dry
Imported
Women's Active & Swim
Item #5833604
